pages.text:
The Imbuing Cauldron is a core element of your pagan adventure and will be used for various things inlcuding the creation of your first rune slabs   \
	  \
      For these, you need to mix 3x cobbled deepslate and 2x Herbs with lava. \
      For further recipes you shoul check JEI.
pages.title: Imbuing Cauldron

pages.text:
Don't spill it!    \
      The cauldron is a single block and does not require a multiblock structure.
